name: moimdv
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wi(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)), wal(s0, wi(w2, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wi(w2, w1)), wi(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wi(w2, w1)), wi(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(w2, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wi(w2, w1)), wi(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s0, wi(w2, w1)), wi(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: The at-most-one quantifier reverses implication, deduction form. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Feb-2017.)
